# Republican Party (Spain, 1913)

The Republican Party (, PRep) was a Republican Spanish politician party created in 1913 as a re-foundation of the Republican movement, following the disbanding of the Republican Union and the splitting of the Radical Republican Party (PRR), the Republican Nationalist Federal Union (UFNR) and the Reformist Party (PRef) from the Republicanâ€“Socialist Conjunction.
